question: Nasrallah remains leader of Hezbollah through July?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Hassan Nasrallah remains the Secretary-General of Hezbollah uninterrupted from June 21, to July 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible reporting.

events.title: Nasrallah remains leader of Hezbollah through July?

question: Will 'A Quiet Place: Day One' gross between $48m and $54m opening weekend?
description:
This is a market on how much 'A Quiet Place: Day One' (2024) will gross domestically on its opening weekend. The Domestic Weekend tab on https://www.boxofficemojo.com/release/rl545096449/ will be used to resolve this market once the values for the 3-day opening weekend (June 28 - June 30) are final (i.e. not studio estimates).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if 'A Quiet Place: Day One' (2024) grosses between $48,000,000 (inclusive) and $54,000,000 (inclusive) on its 3-day opening weekend. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Please note, this market will resolve according to the Box Office Mojo numbers under Domestic Weekend for the 3-day weekend (which typically includes Thursday's previews), regardless of whether domestic refers to only the USA, or to USA and Canada, etc.

If there is no final data available by July 8, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, another credible resolution source will be chosen.

events.title: 'A Quiet Place: Day One' Opening Weekend Box Office

question: Will 'A Quiet Place: Day One' gross more than $54m opening weekend?
description:

This market will resolve to "Yes" if 'A Quiet Place: Day One' (2024) grosses more than $54,000,000 on its 3-day opening weekend. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

events.title: 'A Quiet Place: Day One' Opening Weekend Box Office

question: Will Trump announce VP pick before the debate?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald Trump announces his pick to be his Vice-Presidential running mate before the start of the Presidential debate scheduled for June 27, 2024. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No".

If the debate is canceled or postponed beyond June 27, 2024, this market will resolve to "No".  

The resolution source for this market will be public statements from Trump, or official information from his campaign.

events.title: Will Trump announce VP pick before the debate?

question: Biden asks the moderator to repeat a question during the debate?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Joe Biden asks the moderator to repeat a question at any point during the first in-person presidential debate in the 2024 election cycle. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Requests from Biden to the moderator to repeat part of a question or statement will qualify for a Yes resolution.

Statements from Biden such as saying excuse me or actions such as Biden pointing to his ear, which are not explicit requests to repeat a question but result in the moderator repeating the question or part of the question will qualify for a Yes" resolution. 

If no in-person debate happens before election day, this market will resolve to "No."

If the moderator repeats a question unprompted from Biden, this will NOT qualify for a "Yes" resolution.

The resolution source will be video footage of the debate.

events.title: Biden asks the moderator to repeat a question during the debate?
